products.name: Surface Laptop Studio
products.description: The Surface Laptop Studio is a versatile 2-in-1 laptop with a unique design that adapts to your needs. It features a powerful processor, a stunning display, and a comfortable keyboard.

products.name: Microsoft 365
products.description: Microsoft 365 is a suite of productivity apps and cloud services that include Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and more. Stay connected and collaborate from anywhere.
features: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and more

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: The Xbox Series X is the next-generation gaming console from Microsoft. It offers powerful performance, stunning graphics, and a vast library of games.

products.name: Xbox Series S
products.description: The Xbox Series S is a compact, all-digital gaming console. It's designed for casual gamers and offers fast load times and high-quality gaming experiences.
